string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

slidelink.displaytext: Is the customer eligible for a refund of their $0.01 charge?
Is the customer eligible for a refund of their most recent $10 charge?
Is the customer eligible for a refund of their $5 charge?
Is the customer eligible for a refund of their $98.88 charge?
Is the customer eligible for a refund of their $5 charge?
Is the customer eligible for a refund of their October 31st, $13.46 charge?
What should you do when you get a refund request?
Why do you think Annual accounts have to be canceled if the customer is being refunded for their plan?
How long does it take for a customer to receive their refund?
How can I find a full list of plans?
Review the following policy for Top Ups
What are the different ways a Mexico customer can Top Up their account?l
How much is the Safety Mode service monthly for a U.S. customer?
How much is the Safety Mode service quarterly for a U.S. customer?
If a customer wants to downgrade to the free plan but they do not have the Safety Mode service, will they be able to do it?

If a customer on the 1GB (1024MBs) data plan adds Safety Mode, how much extra data will they get monthly?
Remember, the Safety Mode gives customers 10% more data each month for as long as its active.
Using the Customer Care 2.0 Document, answer the following questions: How can I release my phone from your system? I want to use it with another carrier.

Using the Customer Care 2.0 Document, answer the following questions:
What should you do for an Annual billing customer that wants to downgrade to a Monthly billing cycle?
Using the Customer Care 2.0 Document, answer the following questions: What should you tell a customer that is trying to file a lawsuit against FreedomPop?
Using the Customer Care 2.0 Document, answer the following questions: What should you tell a customer that is threatening to file a Chargeback against FreedomPop?
Using the Customer Care 2.0 Document, answer the following questions: How much will a U.S. customer be Topped Up if they exceed their data plan limit?
Using the Support Website (uk.freedompop.com), answer the following questions: What is needed for a UK customer to port a phone number into their FreedomPop account?

Using the Support Website (support.freedompop.com), answer the following questions:
What is an APN?

Using the Support Website (support.freedompop.com), answer the following questions:
How do iPhone customers edit their APN?
